Nature of Call.quote: Many are called, but few are chosen. (Matthew 22:14)

Divine Invitation.quote: Come to Me, all who are weary and heavy-laden, and I will give you rest. (Matthew 11:28)

Spiritual Awakening.quote: Arise! Awake! And stop not until the goal is reached. (Katha Upanishad 1.3.14)

Inner Voice.quote: And your Lord inspired to the bee, 'Take for yourself among the mountains, houses.' (Quran 16:68)

Sacred Purpose.quote: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, before you were born I set you apart. (Jeremiah 1:5)

Divine Guidance.quote: My sheep hear My voice, and I know them, and they follow Me. (John 10:27)

Spiritual Journey.quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step. (Tao Te Ching, Chapter 64)

Divine Communication.quote: Be still, and know that I am God. (Psalm 46:10)

Sacred Mission.quote: Go therefore and make disciples of all nations. (Matthew 28:19)

Mystical Experience.quote: The breeze at dawn has secrets to tell you. Don't go back to sleep. (Rumi)

Spiritual Recognition.quote: Those who have ears to hear, let them hear. (Matthew 11:15)

Divine Summons.quote: O you who believe! Respond to Allah and His Messenger when he calls you. (Quran 8:24)

Sacred Duty.quote: Stand firm in your duty and abandon all attachment to the success or failure of your work. (Bhagavad Gita 2:48)

Inner Awakening.quote: Wake up! Run for shelter to your preceptor. (Mundaka Upanishad 1.2.13)

Call to Truth.quote: Then I heard the voice of the Lord saying, 'Whom shall I send?' (Isaiah 6:8)

Spiritual Direction.quote: Your own Self-realization is the greatest service you can render the world. (Ramana Maharshi)

Divine Response.quote: Seek and you shall find, knock and the door shall be opened. (Matthew 7:7)

Sacred Connection.quote: The kingdom of God is within you. (Luke 17:21)

Universal Call.quote: Truth is one, though sages know it by many names. (Rig Veda 1.164.46)

Divine Purpose.quote: For we are God's handiwork, created in Christ Jesus to do good works. (Ephesians 2:10)

Spiritual Quest.quote: Not all those who wander are lost. (J.R.R. Tolkien)

Inner Transformation.quote: Be transformed by the renewing of your mind. (Romans 12:2)

Sacred Path.quote: There are many paths to the top of the mountain, but the view is always the same. (Chinese Proverb)

Divine Initiative.quote: You did not choose me, but I chose you. (John 15:16)

Spiritual Calling.quote: Follow your bliss and the universe will open doors where there were only walls. (Joseph Campbell)

Sacred Responsibility.quote: To whom much is given, much will be required. (Luke 12:48)

Divine Voice.quote: Today, if you hear his voice, do not harden your hearts. (Hebrews 3:15)

Universal Message.quote: Let anyone who has an ear listen to what the Spirit is saying. (Revelation 2:7)
